review: ** ********* ** **** ************* * it is comfortable to discusss issues with her as she take time to listen and make patient comfortable...her diagnosis is always through n her treatment is very holistic combination of medicine and lifestyle advice ** *** ** ****** **** *** *******

**** ****** *** ********* ** ******** *** ***. Saw her once at fortis in the past and had to wait well past the time slot I booked. Took an appointment at her clinic this week and was told a day before to come 2 hours earlier, in the middle of the day on a weekday. Ultimately had to cancel. Avoid if you are busy and need to organize your appointments around work schedule.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Ahuja is a very pleasant person to talk to.
She explained me about my problem in a very simple manner. Impressed by her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
If you are pregnant you need a doctor who you can rely and relax.
And she is the one.
She is always prompt in answering your question.
She would explain everything in layman language.
She is just perfect üòç
Very nice doctor. She makes the person very comfortable and relaxed. She is very jolly and positive. 100% recommended.
